title: New Vegan Tuna and Salmon Roll Out at Whole Foods Sushi Counters - VegNews
summary: Kikka Sushi, a longstanding partner of Whole Foods, has launched plant-based tuna and salmon rolls made from a blend of red algae and konjac. This innovation aims to provide a sustainable and realistic alternative to seafood for consumers seeking ethical and health-conscious options.  Kikka Sushi is also developing other vegan seafood items like gyoza and poke, showcasing a growing trend in plant-based alternatives.

title: Lallemand's probiotic authorized in the EU as a technological additive for all animal species - Aquafeed.com
summary: Lallemand Animal Nutrition has received EU authorization for its Pediococcus acidilactici CNCM I-4622 (BACTOCELL) strain to be used as a technological feed additive in liquid feeds for all animal species. This lactic acid bacteria strain, already recognized for its safety and ability to reduce pH and limit bacterial growth in liquid feeds, is authorized for use at a minimum inclusion level of 1x109 CFU/kg feed. This authorization makes BACTOCELL the first lactic acid bacteria to receive this type of authorization related to liquid feed hygiene.
likely_naics_codes: ['325412 - Animal (except poultry) food manufacturing', '325414 - Animal (except poultry) feed manufacturing', '325199 - All other chemical manufacturing', '325998 - All other miscellaneous chemical product and preparation manufacturing']
greenwashing: The article does not present evidence that the product or process is being marketed with exaggerated environmental claims, so it does not appear to be an example of greenwashing.

title: IPPE 2023 launch: Phileo Lesaffre targets poultry production with yeast probiotic - FeedNavigator.com
summary: A new probiotic product, Actisaf Sc 47 HR+, is designed to improve poultry performance by enhancing gut health and feed efficiency. This product, produced by Phileo Lesaffre, has been shown in multiple trials to increase gut microbiota diversity, improve feed use efficiency, and reduce feed conversion ratio, leading to higher body weights and survival rates in poultry. The probiotic's positive effects on gut morphology, including increased villus height and improved villi height vs crypt depth ratio, have been confirmed in peer-reviewed studies.

greenwashing: The article does not provide any evidence to suggest that the product is an example of greenwashing.

title: Serenity Kids Reinvents Smoothies with the Launch of the First Ever Low Sugar, Dairy-Free Smoothies with Grass Fed ... - PR Newswire
summary: Serenity Kids, a leading shelf-stable baby and toddler food brand, has launched a new line of dairy-free smoothie pouches. These pouches are the first to include grass-fed collagen protein, a nutrient-rich ingredient that supports bone, digestive, and connective tissue health. The smoothies are low-sugar, vegetable-forward, and free from added sugars, making them a healthier option for children compared to other dairy-based or overly sugary alternatives.

title: Thai Stock Exchange Plans to Develop New Trading Platform within 1Q23 - KAOHOON INTERNATIONAL - KAOHOON INTERNATIONAL
summary: The Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) has announced a three-year strategic plan focusing on bolstering the Thai capital market by attracting new economy companies, bridging traditional and future investments, and streamlining fundraising and investment processes.  This plan aims to enhance the market's competitiveness and promote sustainability in environmental, social, and governance (ESG) aspects.

title: Flipkart Launches ‘Flipkart Green’ for Customers Looking to Adopt a Sustainable Lifestyle - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita launched a campaign called 'Scars are Beautiful' to celebrate the beauty of postpartum bodies and stretch marks. The campaign features 11 mothers proudly displaying their bodies and sharing their motherhood experiences. The campaign aims to inspire and empower women to embrace their bodies and challenge societal perceptions of beauty.
